bind.calculate: if(selected( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ,'ADVM') and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/TemperatureDifferenceAmount >2, 'Yes', if(selected( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ,'ADVM') and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/TemperatureDifferenceAmount <-2, 'Yes', if(selected( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ,'Transducer') and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/TemperatureDifferenceAmount >0.5, 'Yes', if(selected( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ,'Transducer') and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/TemperatureDifferenceAmount <-0.5,'Yes','No'))))

bind.relevant: /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/HasDataLogger_GroupFilter ='Yes' and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/DifTemperature ='Yes' and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ='ADVM' and string-length( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorLevelInput )>0 and string-length( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorLevelUnits )>0

/NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/HasDataLogger_GroupFilter ='Yes' and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/DifTemperature ='Yes' and /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorSource ='Transducer' and string-length( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorLevelInput )>0 and string-length( /NW_Florida_Hydrologic_Field_Form/LocationVisit/Temperature_start/TemperatureMeasurement/SensorLevelUnits )>0
